title: Real Lux players use Imperial
body:
http://www.leagueoflegendsskins.com/images/champions/splash/Lux_4.jpg

come at me bro 

know why people will buy Elementalist Lux? Deviantart knows why.

Imperial Lux is not flashy, it isn't anything it isn't supposed to be, it is a classic skin that should be respected. also no (insert anime fan slang term here :D) would ever use imperial. that is really why it is the best skin to use on Lux. (commando and steel legion are okay for the same reason, spell thief is a little bit on the "anime" side of things tho)
